channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Access Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Access Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1534|2024-09-17T00:05:31.546Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 8.0.0 and 9.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 130676.

item.title: CVE-2017-1459|2024-09-17T00:07:01.089Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Appliance 8.0.0 and 9.0.0 specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 128378.
